post.content: http://www.toronto.com/E/V/TORON/0020/12/00/ 작년 이맘때 가족과 함께 갔던 곳인데요. 아이들도 물론 좋아하지만 어른들도 재밌게 즐길수 있는 곳입니다. 직접 자기 차를 몰면서 돌아보는데 사자, 호랑이, 코끼리, 원숭이, 기린, 코뿔소 등등등 바로 옆에서 볼수 있구요. 특히 원숭이들은 차위로 올라와서 한동안 재롱을 떨다 가지요. 원숭이가 차위에 올라와서 장난치는 장면 코끼리 행진... 그리고 잠시후엔 단체 목욕 Boat Cruise Admission Prices REGULAR ADMISSION RATES Regular (13-64)...........$19.95 Senior (65+)................$15.95 Children (3-12)............$13.95 Directions to African Lion Safari FROM… TORONTO via 401 - Follow 401 West (London) to exit 299, Highway 6 SOUTH, which is just past Milton. Go SOUTH on Highway 6 for 14 km and turn RIGHT on Safari Road. Follow Safari Road for about 16 km, and you will see us on your right. We are approximately one hour away. TORONTO via Q.E.W. - Follow the Q.E.W. West and then follow Highway 403 West towards Hamilton. Take Highway 6 NORTH towards Guelph. Go NORTH on Highway 6 for 11 km and turn LEFT on Safari Road. Follow Safari Road for 16 km and you will see us on your right. We are approximately one hour away.
